alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Taylor and southwestern Madison Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northwest of Perry, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Iddo, Eridu, Ebb, Sirmans and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
